name: Bid2Work
overview:
Bid2Work is a free contractor bidding service for home maintenance professionals throughout Canada. We provide a unique service which allows home and business owners to post their maintenance needs and for localized contractors to bid on the work orders.

Bid2Work allows those looking for contract workers the freedom to evaluate local contractors based upon different criteria. From customer reviews to service information and bid pricing, we provide the final end customer to assess the best local contractor to fulfill their specific needs.

We allow all local home and maintenance contractors to submit bid proposals for relevant projects directly to the end user. This direct communication allows for our customers to find out direct information prior to hiring any worker to complete their project needs.
